00022 void init_param(std::string *help,
00023                 std::string *version,
00024                 const std::string &system_name,
00025                 const Option *opts) {
00026   *help = std::string(COPYRIGHT) + "\nUsage: " +
00027       system_name + " [options] files\n";
00028 
00029   *version = std::string(PACKAGE) + " of " + VERSION + '\n';
00030 
00031   size_t max = 0;
00032   for (size_t i = 0; opts[i].name; ++i) {
00033     size_t l = 1 + std::strlen(opts[i].name);
00034     if (opts[i].arg_description)
00035       l += (1 + std::strlen(opts[i].arg_description));
00036     max = _max(l, max);
00037   }
00038 
00039   for (size_t i = 0; opts[i].name; ++i) {
00040     size_t l = std::strlen(opts[i].name);
00041     if (opts[i].arg_description)
00042       l += (1 + std::strlen(opts[i].arg_description));
00043     *help += " -";
00044     *help += opts[i].short_name;
00045     *help += ", --";
00046     *help += opts[i].name;
00047     if (opts[i].arg_description) {
00048       *help += '=';
00049       *help += opts[i].arg_description;
00050     }
00051     for (; l <= max; l++) *help += ' ';
00052     *help += opts[i].description;
00053     *help += '\n';
00054   }
00055 
00056   *help += '\n';
00057   return;
00058 }

00060 void Param::dump_config(std::ostream *os) const {
00061   for (std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = conf_.begin();
00062        it != conf_.end();
00063        ++it) {
00064     *os << it->first << ": " << it->second << std::endl;
00065   }
00066 }

00068 bool Param::load(const char *filename) {
00069   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00070 
00071   CHECK_FALSE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00072 
00073   std::string line;
00074   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00075     if (!line.size() ||
00076         (line.size() && (line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#'))) continue;
00077 
00078     size_t pos = line.find('=');
00079     CHECK_FALSE(pos != std::string::npos) << "format error: " << line;
00080 
00081     size_t s1, s2;
00082     for (s1 = pos+1; s1 < line.size() && isspace(line[s1]); s1++);
00083     for (s2 = pos-1; static_cast<long>(s2) >= 0 && isspace(line[s2]); s2--);
00084     const std::string value = line.substr(s1, line.size() - s1);
00085     const std::string key   = line.substr(0, s2 + 1);
00086     set<std::string>(key.c_str(), value, false);
00087   }
00088 
00089   return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool Param::open(int argc, char **argv, const Option *opts) {
00093   int ind = 0;
00094   int _errno = 0;
00095 
00096 #define GOTO_ERROR(n) {                         \
00097     _errno = n;                                 \
00098     goto ERROR; } while (0)
00099 
00100   if (argc <= 0) {
00101     system_name_ = "unknown";
00102     return true;  // this is not error
00103   }
00104 
00105   system_name_ = std::string(argv[0]);
00106 
00107   init_param(&help_, &version_, system_name_, opts);
00108 
00109   for (size_t i = 0; opts[i].name; ++i) {
00110     if (opts[i].default_value) set<std::string>
00111                                    (opts[i].name, opts[i].default_value);
00112   }
00113 
00114   for (ind = 1; ind < argc; ind++) {
00115     if (argv[ind][0] == '-') {
00116       // long options
00117       if (argv[ind][1] == '-') {
00118         char *s;
00119         for (s = &argv[ind][2]; *s != '\0' && *s != '='; s++);
00120         size_t len = (size_t)(s - &argv[ind][2]);
00121         if (len == 0) return true;  // stop the scanning
00122 
00123         bool hit = false;
00124         size_t i = 0;
00125         for (i = 0; opts[i].name; ++i) {
00126           size_t nlen = std::strlen(opts[i].name);
00127           if (nlen == len && std::strncmp(&argv[ind][2],
00128                                           opts[i].name, len) == 0) {
00129             hit = true;
00130             break;
00131           }
00132         }
00133 
00134         if (!hit) GOTO_ERROR(0);
00135 
00136         if (opts[i].arg_description) {
00137           if (*s == '=') {
00138             set<std::string>(opts[i].name, s+1);
00139           } else {
00140             if (argc == (ind+1)) GOTO_ERROR(1);
00141             set<std::string>(opts[i].name, argv[++ind]);
00142           }
00143         } else {
00144           if (*s == '=') GOTO_ERROR(2);
00145           set<int>(opts[i].name, 1);
00146         }
00147 
00148         // short options
00149       } else if (argv[ind][1] != '\0') {
00150         size_t i = 0;
00151         bool hit = false;
00152         for (i = 0; opts[i].name; ++i) {
00153           if (opts[i].short_name == argv[ind][1]) {
00154             hit = true;
00155             break;
00156           }
00157         }
00158 
00159         if (!hit) GOTO_ERROR(0);
00160 
00161         if (opts[i].arg_description) {
00162           if (argv[ind][2] != '\0') {
00163             set<std::string>(opts[i].name, &argv[ind][2]);
00164           } else {
00165             if (argc == (ind+1)) GOTO_ERROR(1);
00166             set<std::string>(opts[i].name, argv[++ind]);
00167           }
00168         } else {
00169           if (argv[ind][2] != '\0') GOTO_ERROR(2);
00170           set<int>(opts[i].name, 1);
00171         }
00172       }
00173     } else {
00174       rest_.push_back(std::string(argv[ind]));  // others
00175     }
00176   }
00177 
00178   return true;
00179 
00180 ERROR:
00181   switch (_errno) {
00182     case 0: WHAT << "unrecognized option `" << argv[ind] << "`"; break;
00183     case 1: WHAT << "`" << argv[ind] << "` requres an argument";  break;
00184     case 2: WHAT << "`" << argv[ind] << "` dosen't allow an argument"; break;
00185   }
00186   return false;
00187 }

00189 void Param::clear() {
00190   conf_.clear();
00191   rest_.clear();
00192 }
00193 
00194 bool Param::open(const char *arg, const Option *opts) {
00195   char str[BUF_SIZE];
00196   std::strncpy(str, arg, sizeof(str));
00197   char* ptr[64];
00198   unsigned int size = 1;
00199   ptr[0] = const_cast<char*>(PACKAGE);
00200 
00201   for (char *p = str; *p;) {
00202     while (isspace(*p)) *p++ = '\0';
00203     if (*p == '\0') break;
00204     ptr[size++] = p;
00205     if (size == sizeof(ptr)) break;
00206     while (*p && !isspace(*p)) p++;
00207   }
00208 
00209   return open(size, ptr, opts);
00210 }

00212 int Param::help_version() const {
00213   if (get<bool>("help")) {
00214     std::cout << help();
00215     return 0;
00216   }
00217 
00218   if (get<bool>("version")) {
00219     std::cout << version();
00220     return 0;
00221   }
00222 
00223   return 1;
00224 }
